Puab teb has tas, “Peb tsuas tuaj khi koj hab coj koj moog cob rua puab xwb, peb tsi tua koj le.” Yog le ntawd, puab txhaj muab tau ob txuj hlua tshab lug khi Xaaxoos hab coj nwg tawm huv qhov tsua lug.

Thaus nwg lug txug huv lub nroog Lehis, cov Filitees dlha nroo ntwg tuaj ntsauv nwg, hab qw ntshu nrooj rua nwg. Taamsim ntawd tug TSWV tug ntsujplig ua rua nwg muaj zug heev, hab nwg ntag ua rua ob txuj hlua kws khi nwg ob txhais npaab hab ob txhais teg tu taag ib yaam le hlawv tej xuv.
Nwg txawm pum ib tug pobtxhaa puabtsaig neeg luav kws tseem tshab khiv, nwg khaws nkaus lug ntaus cov txivneej ntawd tuag lawm ib txheeb leej.

Yog le ntawd Xaaxoos txhaj hu ib zaaj nkauj has tas, “Kuv muab tug pobtxhaa puabtsaig neeg luav nuav ntaus tuag ib txheeb leej txivneej; vim tug pobtxhaa puabtsaig neeg luav nuav, kuv txhaj muab puab pov ua tsheej pawg.”
Dlhau ntawd, nwg txawm muab tug pobtxhaa puabtsaig povtseg lawm. Tub yog muaj tej nuav tshwmsim puab txhaj tis npe rua qhov chaw ntawd hu ua Lamas Lehis.

Xaaxoos nqhes dlej heev, nwg txhaj thov tug TSWV has tas, “Koj tau pub rua kuv muaj yeej luj kawg nkaus; kuv nqhes dlej heev kuv yuav tuag, hab koj yuav ca cov Filitees kws tsi ntseeg koj nteg tau kuv los?”

Vaajtswv txhaj qheb hlo ib lub qhov aav khoob lug huv lub nroog Lehis hab dlej txhawv huv lub qhov ntawd tuaj. Xaaxoos haus cov dlej ntawd, ua rua nwg rov muaj zug tuaj. Luas txhaj tis npe rua lub qhovdlej ntawd hu ua Hakaules.  Naj nub nua lub qhovdlej ntawd tseem nyob huv lub nroog Lehis.
Lub sijhawm kws cov Filitees kaav lub tebchaws ntawd, Xaaxoos ua tug coj cov Yixalayees tau neeg nkaum xyoo nkaus.
Muaj ib nub Xaaxoos moog txug rua huv cov Filitees lub nroog Nkaxas, nwg ntsib ib tug namndlav nyob huv, ces nwg moog nrug tug namndlav ntawd pw.

Muaj tuabneeg moog qha rua cov tuabneeg huv lub nroog Nkaxas has tas, “Xaaxoos tuaj rua huv nuav lawm.” Puab txhaj moog vij qhov chaw ntawd, hab pw ntawm roojvaag nroog zuv ib mos kaaj ntug plawg. Puab zuv ib mos ntsag tu, puab xaav has tas, “Peb yuav tog txug thaus kaaj ntug tsaiv, peb maam nteg nwg tua povtseg.”

Tabsis Xaaxoos moog pw huv txaaj txug thaus ib taag mo xwb. Ces nwg sawv moog dlawj lub roojvaag nroog, ob tug ncej hab tug ntsa laag qhovrooj, nwg muab kwv hlo rua sau xubpwg coj moog povtseg sau lub ncov roob kws saib ntsoov rua huv lub nroog Henploos.
Tom qaab nuav muaj ib nub, Xaaxoos txawm nyam ib tug hluas nkauj hu ua Delilas nyob huv lub Haav Xaules.

Cov Filitees cov thawjcoj moog cuag Delilas hab has rua nwg tas, “Koj sim nug Xaaxoos kuas nwg qha rua koj saib yog vim le caag nwg muaj zug ua luaj, hab yuav ua le caag peb txhaj kovyeej nwg, khi tau nwg hab ua kuas nwg tsi muaj zug. Yog koj nug tau, peb tuamyeem muab ib leeg ib txheeb ib puas dlaim nyaj rua koj.”

Yog le ntawd, Delilas txhaj has rua Xaaxoos has tas, “Thov koj qha rua kuv saib yog ua le caag koj muaj zug ua luaj. Yog leejtwg xaav khi koj hab ua kuas koj tsi muaj zug nua, nwg yuav ua le caag txhaj kovyeej koj?”
Xaaxoos teb has tas, “Yog puab muab xyaa txuj hlua neevnti tshab kws tseem tsi tau qhuav le coj lug khi kuv, ces kuv tsuas muaj zug ib yaam le suavdlawg lawm xwb.”
Yog le ntawd, cov Filitees cov thawjcoj txhaj nqaa tau xyaa txuj hlua neevnti tshab kws tseem tsi tau qhuav tuaj rua Delilas muab Xaaxoos khi ca.

Delilas tub kuas ib cov txivneej moog nyob ib chaav tsev tog lawm, nwg maam qw has tas, “Xaaxoos! Cov Filitees tuaj lawm!” Tabsis Xaaxoos nti ua rua cov hlua ntawd tu zum zawg ib yaam le nplaim tawg kub tej xuv. Yog le ntawd, puab tseem tsi tau paub has tas, yog vim le caag Xaaxoos txhaj muaj zug npaum le ntawd.
Delilas has rua Xaaxoos has tas, “Saib maj, koj dlaag kuv hab tsi qha qhov tseeb rua kuv. Thov qha tseeb rua kuv saib, luas yuav ua le caag txhaj khi tau koj?”
Nwg qha rua Delilas has tas, “Yog puab muab tej hlua tshab kws tsi tau siv lug khi kuv, ces kuv tsuas muaj zug ib yaam le lwm tug lawm xwb.”

Delilas txawm muab ib cov hlua tshab lug khi Xaaxoos hab qw has tas, “Xaaxoos! cov Filitees tuaj lawm!” Cov txivneej yeej nyob rawv huv ib chaav tsev tog. Tabsis Xaaxoos ntag tej hlua kws khi nwg ob saab ncej npaab tu ib yaam le tej xuv.

Delilas has rua Xaaxoos has tas, “Koj tseem dlaag kuv hab tsi qha qhov tseeb rua kuv txug taav nuav le. Qha kuv saib, yuav ua le caag txhaj khi tau koj?” Nwg has rua Delilas has tas, “Yog koj muab kuv xyaa qais plaubhau ntus hab muab lub zuag npuaj kuas ruaj ruaj rua ntawm tug ntus, ces kuv tsuas muaj zug ib yaam le lwm tug lawm xwb.”

Delilas txawm ntxag Xaaxoos pw tsaug zug, ces nwg muab Xaaxoos xyaa qais plaubhau ntus hab muab lub zuag npuaj kuas ruaj ruaj  hab qw has tas, “Xaaxoos! Cov Filitees tuaj lawm!” Tabsis Xaaxoos sawv tseeg ntag ua rua nwg cov plaubhau nplaam plawg ntawm tug ntus lawm.

Yog le ntawd Delilas txhaj has rua Xaaxoos has tas, “Vim le caag koj has tas, ‘Kuv hlub koj.’ Tabsis koj tub tsi muab sab npuab kuv le? Koj dlaag kuv peb zag lawm, hab koj tseem tsi tau qha rua kuv paub has tas yog dlaabtsi ua rua koj muaj zug ua luaj le ntawd.”
Delilas naj nub nug Xaaxoos le ntawd. Xaaxoos dlhuav hab nkeeg noog txug tej kws Delilas pheej txob nwg,

thaus kawg nwg txhaj ua ib sab qha qhov tseeb rua Delilas. Xaaxoos has tas, “Kuv cov plaubhau yeej ibtxwm tsi txav, rua qhov kuv yog ib tug Naxis  rua Vaajtswv txij thaus yug tau kuv lug lawm. Yog muab kuv cov plaubhau txav, kuv tug zug yuav ntaug hab kuv tsuas muaj zug ib yaam le lwm tug lawm xwb.”

Thaus Delilas paub has tas, Xaaxoos qha qhov tseeb rua nwg lawm, nwg txhaj khaiv tuabneeg moog has rua cov Filitees cov thawjcoj has tas, “Mej ca le rov tuaj. Nwg tub qha qhov tseeb rua kuv lawm.” Ces puab txawm tuaj hab nqaa nyaj tuaj.
Delilas muab Xaaxoos ntxag pw tsaug zug rua huv nwg xubndlag, hab hu ib tug txivneej lug muab Xaaxoos xyaa qais plaubhau txav.  Ces Delilas txawm tsimtxom Xaaxoos, rua qhov Xaaxoos tsi muaj zug lawm.

Delilas qw has tas, “Xaaxoos! Cov Filitees tuaj lawm!” Xaaxoos sawv tseeg lug, nwg xaav has tas, “Ua le caag los kuv tseem yuav muaj zug hab tsiv dlim.” Nwg tsi paub has tas tug TSWV tub tawm ntawm nwg moog lawm.
Cov Filitees txhaj nteg tau nwg hab muab nwg ob lub qhovmuag kaus povtseg. Puab caab nwg moog rua huv lub nroog Nkaxas, muab saw hlau khi nwg, hab yuam nwg zum zeb huv tsev lojcuj.
Tabsis nwg cov plaubhau kws puab muab txav lawm, ntev zuj zug rov tuaj.

Cov Filitees cov thawjcoj tuaj sis sau ua ke coj khoom tuaj fij ua kev zoo sab txi puab tug vaajtswv Dankoos. Puab hu nkauj has tas, “Peb tug vaajtswv tau coj Xaaxoos kws yog peb tug yeebncuab lug cob rua peb teg lawm tag lauj!”

Thaus cov tuabneeg suavdlawg pum Xaaxoos, puab hu nkauj qhuas puab tug vaajtswv has tas, “Peb tug vaajtswv coj peb tug yeebncuab lug cob rua peb teg lawm, nwg yog tug rhuav tshem peb lub tebchaws hab tua peb cov tuabneeg tuag ua tsheej pawg ntaag.”
Thaus puab tuaj ua ke zoo sab, puab has tas, “Coj Xaaxoos tawm lug rua peb saib.”  Ces puab txhaj coj Xaaxoos tawm huv tsev lojcuj lug rua puab saib.
Xaaxoos has rua tug mivnyuas tub kws tuav nwg teg lug ntawd has tas, “Koj coj kuv moog tuav cov ncej tse nuav. Rua qhov kuv xaav pheeb cov ncej ntawd.”

Lub tsev ntawd muaj quaspuj hab txivneej coob heev tuaj nyob puv nkaus. Cov Filitees cov thawjcoj puavleej tuaj nyob ntawd. Xaam taagnrho quaspuj hab txivneej muaj kwvlaam peb txheeb leej tuaj sawv txheej tsev sau saib Xaaxoos.

Ces Xaaxoos thov has tas, “Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam, thov ncu txug kuv lauj! Vaajtswv, zag nuav thov koj pub rua kuv rov muaj zug le qub ib zag ntxiv, kuas kuv pauj tau cov Filitees nuav. Kuv chim heev vim puab muab kuv ob lub qhovmuag kaus povtseg lawm.”
Yog le ntawd, Xaaxoos txhaj tuav ob tug ncej huv plawv kws txheem lub tsev ntawd. Nwg muab ib saab teg tuav ib tug ncej, ces nwg thawb ob tug ncej ntawd,

hab qw has tas, “Ca kuv tuag nrug cov Filitees ua ke lauj!” Nwg siv zug thawb taagnrho nwg tug zug, lub tsev ntawd txhaj qaug lug ntaus cov thawjcoj hab txhua tug kws nyob huv lub tsev ntawd tuag taag huv tuabsi. Thaus Xaaxoos tuag, nwg tua cov Filitees tuag coob tshaaj thaus nwg tseem ua neej nyob.

Nwg cov kwvtij hab nwg tsev tuabneeg tuaj kwv nwg moog log rua huv nwg txiv Manau-as lub qhov ntxaa kws nyob ntawm lub nroog Xaulas hab lub nroog Eta-aus ntu nruab nraab. Nwg ua cov Yixalayees tug thawjcoj tau neeg nkaum xyoo.
Muaj ib tug txivneej npe hu ua Mikhas nyob peg laaj roob Efalayees.

Nwg has rua nwg nam has tas, “Koj ib txheeb ib puas dlaim nyaj kws luas nyag lawm, koj tau foom tsi zoo rua tug tubsaab ntawd, nwgnuav cov nyaj nyob ntawm kuv. Kuv yog tug nyag cov nyaj ntawd ntaag.” Nwg nam has tas, “Kuv tug mivtub, thov tug TSWV foom koob moov rua koj!”

Nwg muab cov nyaj ntawd rov qaab rua nwg nam, nwg nam has tas, “Thov kuas tej lug kws kuv foom tsi zoo poob ntawm kuv tug tub moog, kuv thov coglug muab cov nyaj nuav fij rua tug TSWV. Yuav muab cov nyaj nuav moog ua ob tug mlom, ib tug yog txaug hab ib tug yog nchuav. Yog le ntawd, kuv yuav muab cov nyaj nuav rov qaab rua koj.”

Yog le ntawd, nwg txhaj muab cov nyaj ntawd rov rua nwg nam. Nwg nam txhaj nqaa ob puas dlaim nyaj ntawd moog rua ib tug kws nchuav nyaj, nwg muab ua ob tug mlom, ib tug yog txaug hab ib tug yog nchuav, nqaa moog txawb rua huv Mikhas tsev.
Tug Mikhas nuav, muaj ib lub tsev teev mlom. Nwg muaj ntau tug mlom hab muaj ib tug efaus,  nwg tsaa nwg cov tub ib tug ua povthawj.
Lub sijhawm ntawd cov Yixalayees tsi muaj vaajntxwv kaav puab; txhua tug tuabneeg nyag ua lawv le nyag lub sab nyam xwb.
Lub sijhawm ntawd, muaj ib tug tub hluas Levis nyob huv lub nroog Npelehees huv xeev Yudas.
Nwg tsiv tawm huv lub nroog Npelehees moog nrhav chaw nyob rua lwm qhov. Thaus nwg taabtom taug kev moog, nwg moog txug huv Mikhas lub tsev kws nyob peg laaj roob Efalayees.
Mikhas nug tug tub hluas ntawd has tas, “Koj tuaj qhov twg tuaj?” Nwg teb has tas, “Kuv yog ib tug tub hluas Levis, kuv nyob huv lub nroog Npelehees xeev Yudas tuaj. Kuv tuaj nrhav chaw nyob.”
Mikhas teb has tas, “Koj ca le nrug kuv nyob ua kuv txiv hab ua kuv tug povthawj. Ib xyoos twg kuv muab kaum dlaim nyaj, muab rig tsho hab zaub mov rua koj.”
Tug tub hluas Levis txaus sab nrug Mikhas nyob hab ua zoo le nwg yog Mikhas tug tub lawm ntaag.
Mikhas tsaa nwg ua Mikhas tug povthawj hab nwg nyob huv Mikhas tsev.
Mikhas has tas, “Nwgnuav kuv muaj ib tug Levis lug ua kuv tug povthawj lawm. Kuv paub tug TSWV yuav ua kuas txhua yaam zoo rua kuv.”

Thaus lub sijhawm ntawd, cov Yixalayees tsi tau muaj vaajntxwv. Thaus ntawd xeem Daas tseem pheej moog nrhav chaw rua puab nyob, rua qhov puab tsi tau muaj ib thaaj aav twg huv tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees rua puab nyob ua puab tug le.

Yog le ntawd, cov Daas txhaj xaiv tau tsib tug txivneej kws sab tawv heev  sawv cev ntawm txhua tsev tuabneeg huv xeem Daas hab tso puab tawm huv lub nroog Xaulas hab Eta-aus moog ncig hab soj lub tebchaws. Thaus puab tuaj txug rua ntawm lub laaj roob Efalayees, puab moog su huv Mikhas tsev.
Thaus puab moog su tau ntev loo rua huv lawm, puab ncu tau tug tub hluas Levis lub suab has lug, ces puab txawm moog cuag nwg hab nug has tas, “Koj tuaj ua dlaabtsi ntawm nuav? Leejtwg coj koj tuaj?”
Nwg teb has tas, “Mikhas khaiv kuv ua ntau yaam, nwg ndlav kuv ua nwg ib tug povthawj.”
Puab has rua nwg tas, “Thov koj paab thov Vaajtswv saib txujkev kws peb moog ntawd puas yuav muaj kev vaammeej rua peb?”
Tug povthawj teb has tas, “Mej tsi xob nyuaj sab txug ib yaam dlaabtsi le, tug TSWV yuav tsomkwm mej thaus mej taabtom taug kev moog.”

Yog le ntawd, tsib tug txivneej ntawd txhaj sawv kev moog rua huv lub nroog La-isas lawm. Puab moog pum cov tuabneeg huv muaj zoo vaaj zoo tsev nyob kaaj sab lug ib yaam le cov tuabneeg Xidaunias. Puab nyob thaajyeeb lug, puab cov tuabneeg nyob ntsag tu, tsi muaj kev sis caav sis tshe nrug leejtwg; puab muaj txhua yaam kws puab xaav tau.  Puab nyob dleb heev ntawm lub nroog Xidaunias, hab puab yeej tsi cog phoojywg nrug leejtwg le.
Thaus tsib tug txivneej ntawd rov lug txug rua huv lub nroog Xaulas hab Eta-aus, puab cov kwvtij tuaj nug puab zum zawg has tas, “Mej puas pum dlaabtsi coj lug pav qha rua peb?”

Puab teb has tas, “Mej ca le tuaj, peb yuav moog tua lub nroog La-isas. Peb moog pum tej aav hab lub nroog ntawd zoo kawg nkaus le. Tsi xob ua ib yaam dlaabtsi nyob ntawm nuav le lawm. Maaj ceev nrooj! Ca le moog hab txeeb kuas tau taagnrho lub nroog ntawd.

Thaus mej moog txug ntawd lawm, mej yuav ntsib cov tuabneeg kws nyob tsi ntshai dlaabtsi. Lub tebchaws ntawd luj heev; nyob huv lub tebchaws ntawd muaj txhua yaam kws tuabneeg xaav yuav xaav tau. Vaajtswv tub muab lub tebchaws ntawd cob rua mej lawm.”
Yog le ntawd, xeem Daas txhaj txhij tau rau pua leej tubrog hab npaaj cuabyeej ua rog tawm huv lub nroog Xaulas hab Eta-aus moog txeeb lub tebchaws ntawd.
Puab moog tsuam yeej rua ntawm lub nroog Kili-as Ye-alees saab nubpoob huv xeev Yudas. Tub yog vim le ntawd txhaj tseem muab qhov chaw ntawd hu ua Daas lub Yeej lug txug naj nub nua.
Puab txhaj sawv kev qhov ntawd moog txug rua ntawm Mikhas lub tsev peg lub laaj roob Efalayees.

Ces tsib tug txivneej kws puab tub xub moog soj lub tebchaws hab ncig saib lub nroog La-isas lawm, txhaj has rua puab cov kwvtij tas, “Mej puas paub huv lub tsev nuav muaj ob tug mlom nyaj, ib tug yog txaug hab ib tug yog nchuav? Nyob rua huv tseem muaj lwm yaam mlom hab muaj ib tug mlom efaus. Mej sim xaav saib peb yuav ua le caag?”
Yog le ntawd, puab txhaj moog rua huv Mikhas tsev, yog lub tsev kws tug tub hluas Levis nyob, hab nug tug hluas Levis saib nwg puas noj qaab nyob zoo.
Thaus lub sijhawm ntawd, cov Daas rau pua leej tubrog kws npaaj rawv cuabyeej sis tua, tub sawv nreg nroog ntawm roojvaag tog lawm.

Ces tsib tug kws moog soj lub tebchaws ntawd, ca le ncaaj nraim moog rua huv tsev hab muab kag tug mlom ntoo kws vuam nyaj, tej mlom huv tsev, hab tug mlom efaus nqaa tawm lug, thaus kws tug povthawj tseem nrug rau pua leej txivneej kws nqaa rawv cuabyeej ua rog sawv ntawm roojvaag.

Thaus cov txivneej moog huv Mikhas tsev hab muab tug mlom txaug kws vuam nyaj, tug efaus, Mikhas tsev tuabneeg tej mlom hab tug mlom nchuav nqaa lug, ces tug povthawj nug puab has tas, “Mej ua dlaabtsi le ko?”

Puab has rua nwg tas, “Ua tuabywv tsi xob has lug! Koj ca le nrug peb moog ua peb tug povthawj hab ua peb txiv. Koj ua povthawj rua ib tsev nyuas tuabneeg tseem zoo dlua le koj ua rua cov Yixalayees ib xeem hab los?”
Qhov nuav ua rua tug povthawj ntawd zoo sab heev. Yog le ntawd, nwg txhaj nqaa taagnrho cov mlom nrug puab moog lawm.
Puab tso puab tej mivnyuas, tej tsaj txhu hab txhua yaam moog ua puab ntej.
Puab taug kev ntawm Mikhas tsev moog tau ntev loo, Mikhas maam le hu nwg tej kwvtij zej zog moog caum puab qaab. Puab moog caum cuag cov Daas,
hab puab qw ntsoog qeeg rua cov Daas. Cov Daas tig hlo lug nug Mikhas has tas, “Peb ua txhum koj dlaabtsi, koj yuav coj tuabneeg coob ua luaj tuaj caum peb?”

Mikhas teb has tas, “Mej tub coj kuv tug povthawj hab nyag tej mlom kws kuv ua taag lug lawm los sav! Tshuav dlaabtsi txhaj tseem yog kuv le? ua le caag mej tseem muaj cai nug kuv has tas, ‘Peb ua txhum koj dlaabtsi, koj yuav coj tuabneeg coob ua luaj tuaj caum peb?’ ”
Cov Daas has rua Mikhas has tas, “Zoo dlua le koj tsi xob has ib lu lug ua rua peb chim, nyob tsaam cov tuabneeg nuav tig lug tua koj. Ces koj hab koj tsev tuabneeg yuav tuag taag.”
Ces cov Daas txawm moog lawm. Mikhas pum puab yeej muaj zug tshaaj nwg, nwg txhaj ua ib sab rov lug tsev lawm.

Puab coj txhua yaam kws Mikhas ua, hab nwg tug povthawj nrug puab moog tua cov tuabneeg kws nyob thaajyeeb lug hab tsi ntshai dlaabtsi huv lub nroog La-isas. Puab muab ntaaj tua cov tuabneeg tuag taag hab muab tej vaaj tse hlawv huv tuabsi povtseg.
Tsi muaj leejtwg tuaj paab puab, vim puab nyob nrug dleb ntawm lub nroog Xidoos, hab puab tsi nrug leejtwg cog phoojywg le. Lub nroog La-isas nyob huv lub haav kws ze lub nroog Npelehaus.
Puab txhaj muab lub nroog La-isas hloov dlua npe hu ua Daas, lawv le puab yawmkoob Daas kws yog Yakhauj tug tub lub npe.

Cov Daas muab tug mlom ntawd moog teeb rua puab pe, puab tsaa Nkesoos tug tub Yaunathaas kws yog Mauxes tug xeebntxwv ua tug povthawj, hab Yaunathaas cov xeebntxwv puavleej tau ua puab cov povthawj moog txug thaus kws puab raug luas nteg coj moog lawm.
Cov Daas tug mlom kws Mikhas ua ntawd, txij thaus lub Tsevntaub kws yog qhov chaw pehawm Vaajtswv tseem nyob huv lub nroog Silaus.

Ua ntej cov Yixalayees muaj vaajntxwv, muaj ib tug tuabneeg Levis nyob peg lub laaj roob Efalayees kws nyob nrug dleb rua ib qho. Nwg tuaj yuav tau ib tug hluas nkauj huv lub nroog Npelehees xeev Yudas ua nwg nam yau.
Tabsis tug nam yau ntawd tsi txaus sab rua nwg tug quasyawg, nwg txhaj tsiv rov qaab moog rua nraag nwg txiv tsev huv lub nroog Npelehees, hab nyob nraag tau plaub hlis.

Ces tug quasyawg caum qaab moog hab thov kuas nwg rov lug nrug tug quasyawg nyob. Tug quasyawg coj nwg tug qhev hab caab ob tug neeg luav nrug nwg moog. Nwg tug nam yau txawm coj nwg moog huv leej txiv tsev, thaus leej txiv pum tug Levis, nwg lug puag nkaus hab zoo sab heev.
Ces nwg yawmtxiv cheem kuas nwg nyob, nwg txhaj nrug yawmtxiv nyob tau peb nub, noj haus hab pw huv yawmtxiv tsev.
Nub plaub puab txawm sawv ntxuv lug npaaj hab yuav rov lug tsev. Tabsis yawmtxiv cheem nwg tug vauv has tas, “Ua tshais sav rua mej noj tsaiv, mej maam le moog.”
Yog le ntawd, yawmtxiv hab tug vauv rov nyob quastsawg noj haus ua ke dlua. Ces yawmtxiv has rua tug vauv has tas, “Rov pw ib mos ntxiv kuas peb zoo sab tsaiv.”
Tug Levis yuav sawv kev moog, tabsis yawmtxiv cheem nwg heev kuas nyob xwb, yog le ntawd, nwg txhaj pw ib mos ntxiv.

Nub tsib thaus sawv ntxuv nwg txawm sawv kev moog, tabsis yawmtxiv has tas, “Tog noj tshais taag tsaiv maam le moog.” Obtug txhaj tog txug thaus nub qaij, yawmtxiv hab tug vauv rov moog noj mov ua ke.

Thaus tug txivneej ntawd, nwg tug nam yau hab tug qhev rov sawv kev dlua, yawmtxiv txawm has tas, “Nub tub yuav poob qho; mej yuavtsum tau rov nyob ib mos ntxiv hab tsaiv. Tub yuav tsaus ntuj taamsim nuav ntaag; nyob kuas zoo sab. Pigkig mej maam le sawv ntxuv moog.”
Tabsis tug Levis tsi kaam nyob lawm, nwg txhaj sawv kev coj nwg tug nam yau, ob tug neeg luav hab tug qhev moog rua tom lub zog Yenpus, (kws yog lub nroog Yeluxalees.)

Thaus puab lug txug ze rua ntawm Yenpus lub nub tub yuav laug poob qho, tug qhev has rua nwg tug tswv has tas, “Yuav ua le caag, tub yuav tsaus ntuj, ces peb su ib mos huv cov Yenpus lub nroog, pigkig peb maam le moog.”
Tug tswv teb has tas, “Cov tuabneeg ntawd tsi yog Yixalayees, peb tsi xob pw huv puab lub nroog. Peb moog kuas txug tom lub nroog Nkinpe-as tsaiv, peb maam le su tod.”
Nwg has ntxiv tas, “Peb moog ceev nrooj kuas txug lub nroog Nkinpe-as lossis Lamas tsaiv, peb maam le pw ib mos tom ob lub nroog ntawd ib lub.”
Yog le ntawd, puab txhaj dlhau lub nroog Yenpus lug txug rua huv lub nroog Nkinpe-as kws yog xeem Npeenyamees cheebtsaam aav, nub taabtom poob qho kag.
Puab txhaj ncaim kev moog nrhav chaw pw rua huv lub nroog ntawd. Puab moog nyob ntawm ib qhov chaw huv plawv nroog, tabsis tsi muaj leejtwg tuaj coj puab moog tsev le.

Puab nyob qhov ntawd tau ntev loo, muaj ib tug txivneej laug moog ua teb lug, thaus ntawd lub nub tub poob qho lawm. Nwg yeej ibtxwm yog tuabneeg nyob peg lub laaj roob Efalayees, tabsis nwgnuav nwg lug nyob nraag lub nroog Nkinpe-as lawm. (Cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog ntawd yog xeem Npeenyamees.)
Tug yawm laug ntawd pum cov tuabneeg taug kev kws lug su ntawm plawv nroog hab nwg nug has tas, “Mej tuaj qhov twg tuaj? Mej yuav moog qhov twg?”
Tug Levis teb has tas, “Peb moog nraag lub nroog Npelehees huv xeev Yudas lug, hab peb yuav rov lug moog tsev  rua peg lub laaj roob Efalayees,

txawm yog peb muaj quavnyaab rua peb cov neeg luav noj, hab muaj ncuav, muaj cawv txiv maab rua kuv, kuv tug nam yau hab kuv tug qhev noj. Txhua yaam peb puavleej muaj txhij los yeej tsi muaj leejtwg coj peb moog nrhav chaw su le.”
Tug yawm laug ntawd has tas, “Mej ca le moog su huv kuv tsev! Kuv yuav nrhav chaw rua mej; mej tsi xob pw ntawm tshaav puam nuav.”
Yog le ntawd, nwg txhaj coj puab moog huv nwg tsev hab muab zaub rua puab cov neeg luav noj. Nwg muab dlej rua puab ntxuav kutaw hab rau mov rua puab noj.

Thaus puab su lug sav lawm, muaj ib paab tuabneeg phem ua nkauj ua nraug huv lub nroog ntawd txawm tuaj vij lub tsev hab tsoo qhovrooj. Puab has rua tug yawm laug has tas, “Ca le coj tug txivneej kws koj coj lug tsev lawm tuaj rua peb! Peb xaav ntxag nwg heev!”
Tabsis tug yawm laug tawm moog saab nrau hab has tas, “Kuv cov phoojywg! Thov lauj! Mej tsi xob ua tej kev phem kev qas, kev tsi ncaaj tsi nceeg le nuav! Tug txivneej nuav yog kuv tug qhua.

Mej saib, tug nuav yog nwg tug nam yau hab kuv tug ntxhais nkaujxwb. Kuv yuav coj obtug tuaj taamsim nuav, mej ca le coj obtug moog, hab ua rua obtug lawv le mej sab nyam. Tabsis thov tsi xob ua phem rua tug txivneej nuav.”

Tabsis cov txivneej ntawd tsi noog tug yawm laug has le. Yog le ntawd, tug Levis txhaj thawb ntag nwg tug nam yau rua saab nrau rua puab. Puab mos ntho nwg hab muab nwg yuam ib mos kaaj ntug plawg maam le tso nwg lug.
Thaus kaaj ntug txoog tug quaspuj txhaj lug qaug rua ntawm tug yawm laug lub qhovrooj, lub tsev kws nwg tug quasyawg su. Nwg pw nrau qhovrooj moog txug thaus nub tuaj.
Nwg tug quasyawg sawv ntxuv lug, hab thaus nwg qheb qhovrooj yuav moog tsev, nwg pum nwg tug nam yau pw xyaab leeg ntawm qhovrooj, ob txhais teg ncaav moog rua ntawm lub qhovrooj.
Nwg txhaj has tas, “Ca le sawv. Peb yuav moog tsev.” Tabsis tsi nov teb le. Yog le ntawd, nwg txhaj puag hlo tug quaspuj rua sau tug neeg luav nrausqaum hab moog tsev lawm.
Thaus nwg lug txug tsev, nwg muab rag txav nwg tug nam yau lub cev ua kaum ob thooj, hab muab xaa moog rua kaum ob xeem Yixalayees ib xeem ib thooj.

Txhua tug kws pum thooj nqaj ntawd puavleej has tas, “Peb ibtxwm tsi tau pum dlua ib zag le nuav. Txij thaus peb tsiv nraag tebchaws Iziv lug, tsi tau muaj tej xwmtxheej phem zoo le nuav tshwmsim rua peb tsaav tuabneeg le. Peb yuavtsum tau mob sab txug zaaj nuav! Hab saablaaj saib peb yuav ua le caag.”

Taagnrho cov Yixalayees kws nyob peg lub nroog Daas saab qaumteb thoob plawg moog txug nraag lub nroog Npesenpas saab qaabteb, thoob plawg lug rua huv lub xeev Nkile-as kws nyob saab nubtuaj, puavleej teb lu lug nqua hu ntawd. Puab tuaj txoos ua ke koom ua ib lub sab taabmeeg tug TSWV huv qhov chaw sis ntsib ntawm lub nroog Mixepas.
Txhua xeem Yixalayees cov thawjcoj puavleej tuaj koom nrug Vaajtswv tsaav tuabneeg, muaj plaub puas txheeb tug tubrog kws nqaa rawv cuabyeej ua rog tuaj nyob qhov ntawd.

Thaus kws cov Npeenyamees nov has tas, taagnrho cov Yixalayees tuaj sis sau rua huv lub nroog Mixepas lawm. Ces cov Yixalayees nug has tas, “Qha rua peb saib, yog ua le caag txhaj muaj txujkev phem kev qas le nuav?”
Tug Levis kws tug nam yau raug tua ntawd teb has tas, “Thaus kuv tug nam yau hab kuv lug txug nraag lub nroog Nkinpe-as, huv cov Npeenyamees cheebtsaam aav, wb lug pw ib mos nraag.

Mo ntawd cov txivneej kws nyob huv lub nroog Nkinpe-as txawm tuaj vij tsev nteg kuv. Puab npaaj sab xaav tua kuv povtseg; tabsis puab txawm mos ntho kuv tug nam yau coj moog yuam hab ua rua nwg tuag le lawm.

Kuv txhaj coj nwg lub cevlug txav ua tej thooj le nuav, hab muab xaa moog thoob plawg cov Yixalayees kaum ob xeem, ib xeem ib thooj. Cov tuabneeg nuav tau ua phem ua qas hab ua tsi ncaaj rhuav peb ntsejmuag kawg le.
Taagnrho mej cov kws nyob ntawm nuav puavleej yog tuabneeg Yixalayees. Saib peb yuav ua le caag rua zaaj nuav?”
Taagnrho cov pejxeem txhaj sawv tseeg hab has tas, “Tsi pub peb ib tug twg kws nyob huv tsevntaub lossis nyob huv tsev, moog tsev le.!
Peb yuavtsum ua le nuav: Peb ca le rhu ntawv hab xaiv ib paab tuabneeg moog tua lub nroog Nkinpe-as.

Muab cov Yixalayees rhu kaum leej tawm ntawm ib puas leej, ib puas leej tawm ntawm ib txheeb leej, ib txheeb leej tawm ntawm kaum txheeb leej, ua cov muab zaub mov rua cov tubrog noj, hab dlua le lwm cov ca moog rau txim rua cov tuabneeg huv lub nroog Nkinpe-as  txujkev ua tsi ncaaj kws puab tau ua txhum rua tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees nuav.”
Yog le ntawd, taagnrho cov Yixalayees cov txivneej txhaj tuaj sis sau koom ua ib lub sab moog tua lub nroog Nkinpe-as.
Txhua xeem Yixalayees puavleej khaiv tuabneeg xaa xuv moog thoob plawg xeem Npeenyamees has tas, “Vim le caag mej yuav ua phem ua qas le nuav?

Nwgnuav mej ca le muab cov nam tuabneeg phem kws nyob huv lub nroog Nkinpe-as cob rua peb teg, peb yuav muab puab tua povtseg kuas taag, txhaj le tshem tau txujkev phem kev qas nuav tawm huv tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees moog.” Tabsis cov Npeenyamees tsi quavntsej noog cov Yixalayees has le.
Taagnrho cov Npeenyamees kws nyob txhua lub nroog txawm tuaj sis sau rua huv Nkinpe-as tua cov Yixalayees.
Nub ntawd cov Npeenyamees txawm txhij tau neeg nkaum rau txheeb tug tubrog kws txawj tua ntaaj huv puab tej nroog tuaj ntxiv rua xyaa pua tug tubrog  kws puab xaiv tshwjxeeb huv lub nroog Nkinpe-as.

Taagnrho cov tubrog xyaa pua leej kws puab xaiv tshwjxeeb ntawd, xis saab txhumphem xwb, hab txhua tug puavleej txawj ntaus zeg hlua ncaaj kawg le, txawm yog tsom ntsoov rua ib txuj plaubhau xwb los yeej raug le.
Cov Yixalayees tej tubrog kws txeev tua rog lug lawm muaj plaub puas txheeb leej; tsi suav cov Npeenyamees.

Cov Yixalayees moog rua huv lub chaw pehawm Vaajtswv huv lub nroog Npethees hab nug Vaajtswv has tas, “Peb yuav ca xeem twg ua ntej moog tua cov Npeenyamees?” Tug TSWV teb has tas, “Ca xeem Yudas moog ua ntej.”
Yog le ntawd, taagkig sawv ntxuv cov Yixalayees txawm moog tsuam yeej ze rua ntawm lub nroog Nkinpe-as.
Cov Yixalayees txhaj moog tua cov Npeenyamees, hab cov tubrog moog nyob taagnrho rua tej chaw kws yuav sis tua ntawm lub nroog Nkinpe-as.
Thaus nub tseem tsi tau poob qho, cov tubrog Npeenyamees tawm huv nroog tuaj tua cov tubrog Yixalayees tuag lawm neeg nkaum ob txheeb leej.

Ces cov Yixalayees rov moog rua ntawm qhov chaw pehawm Vaajtswv hab quaj thov tug TSWV moog txug thaus tsaus ntuj. Puab nug tug TSWV has tas, “Puas tsimnyog peb moog ua rog tawmtsaam peb cov kwvtij Npeenyamees ntxiv lawm?” Tug TSWV teb has tas, “Mej ca le rov qaab moog.?” Yog le ntawd, cov tubrog Yixalayees txhaj zoo sab hlo rov moog nyob ntawm puab tej qub chaw kws puab tub xub nyob thawj nub lawm.
Nub ob cov Yixalayees rov moog tua cov Npeenyamees dlua.
Nub ob cov tubrog Npeenyamees rov tawm huv lub nroog Nkinpe-as tuaj tua cov Yixalayees, zag nuav puab tua cov tubrog Yixalayees kws txeev tua rog lug lawm tuag kaum yim txheeb leej.

Ces cov tubrog Yixalayees rov moog rua peg lub nroog Npethees, hab quaj rua tug TSWV dlua. Puab moog nyob huv qhov chaw kws nrug tug TSWV sis ntsib hab yoo mov moog txug thaus tsaus ntuj. Puab muab tsaj tua hlawv fij hab fij khoom ua kev sis raug zoo rua tug TSWV.

Lub sijhawm ntawd, lub Phijxaab kws ntim Vaajtswv tej lug cog tseg tseem nyob huv lub nroog Npethees, hab Ele-axas tug tub Finehas kws yog Aloos tug xeebntxwv, ua tug saib lub Phijxaab ntawd. Cov pejxeem txhaj nug tug TSWV has tas, “Peb tseem yuav rov moog ua rog rua peb cov kwvtij Npeenyamees dlua lossis ca peb tso tseg?” Tug TSWV teb has tas, “Ca le rov moog tua. Pigkig Kuv yuav pub kuas mej tua yeej cov Npeenyamees.”
Yog le ntawd, cov Yixalayees txhaj tso ib cov tubrog moog nkaum puagncig lub nroog Nkinpe-as.
Ces nub peb cov Yixalayees rov moog tua cov Npeenyamees hab puab cov tubrog moog nyob rua ntawm puab tej chaw sis tua huv lub nroog Nkinpe-as ib yaam le ob zag taag lug lawm.

Cov Npeenyamees txawm tawm tuaj tua hab raug ntxag coj moog dleb ntawm lub nroog. Puab txawm pib tua cov Yixalayees ib yaam le puab tua thawj ob zag. Nyob tom taj nraag hab ntawm ob txujkev tshuam; ib txuj moog rua huv lub nroog Npethees hab ib txuj moog rua huv lub nroog Nkinpe-as. Puab tua cov Yixalayees tuag peb caug leej.
Cov Npeenyamees has tas, “peb yuav tua yeej puab ib yaam le thawj ob zag taag lug lawm hab.” Tabsis cov Yixalayees tuav tswvyim ntxag hab coj cov Npeenyamees moog kuas nrug dleb lub nroog tsaiv.

Yog le ntawd, thaus cov tubrog Yixalayees ua txuj tsiv rov qaab hab moog sis sau rua peg Npa-aas Tamaj, ces taamsim ntawd cov tubrog dlha tawm huv puab tej chaw nkaum ntawm lub nroog Nkinpe-as  saab nubpoob lug.

Ces kaum txheeb leej txivneej kws xaiv tshwjxeeb ntawd cov Yixalayees txhaj moog tua lub nroog Nkinpe-as, hab puab sis tua nyaav kawg le. Cov Npeenyamees tsi paub has tas, puab yuav raug kev puamtsuaj luj npaum le ntawd.
Tug TSWV pub cov Yixalayees tua yeej cov Npeenyamees. Nub ntawd cov Yixalayees tua puab cov yeebncuab tuag neeg nkaum tsib txheeb ib puas leej,

cov Npeenyamees txhaj paub has tas, puab swb cov Yixalayees lawm. Cov tubrog Yixalayees ua txuj swb cov Npeenyamees rov qaab ntawd, tub yog puab ca sab rua cov kws puab tso moog nkaum puagncig lub nroog Nkinpe-as.
Cov txivneej ntawd dlha ceev nrooj moog rua huv lub nroog Nkinpe-as; puab sis faib moog thoob plawg lub nroog hab tua txhua tug kws nyob huv tuag taag huv tuabsi.

Paab tubrog Yixalayees hab cov txivneej kws nkaum ntawm ntug nroog, sis thaam kuas muab tej yaam dlaabtsi hlawv kuas muaj paa nchu rua sau nruab ntug. Hab thaus cov Yixalayees kws ua txuj tsiv tawm huv tshaav rog lug pum cov paa nchu nto ntuj plawg huv lub nroog tuaj;
ces puab tig rov qaab tiv tua. Thaus ntawd cov Npeenyamees tub tua cov Yixalayees tuag peb caug leej lawm. Puab rov sis thaam has tas, “Yog tag, cov Yixalayees swb peb ib yaam le thawj ob zag lawm.”
Tabsis thaus paa tawg pib nchu luj zuj zug tshwm tom nroog tuaj, cov Npeenyamees tig saib pum paa tawg nchu auv nab nto ntuj plawg, ua rua puab xaav tsi thoob le.
Ces cov Yixalayees tig tua cov Npeenyamees, hab cov Npeenyamees poob sab luj heev, rua qhov puab paub has tas, zag nuav puab raug kev puamtsuaj lawm.

Puab txhaj tig tsiv cov Yixalayees taug kev moog rua tom taj suabpuam, tabsis puab tsiv tsi dlim le. Puab taabtom moog raug paab tubrog kws coob tshaaj hab cov txivneej kws rov huv lub nroog lug  nteg hab muab tua tuag taag xwb.
Cov Yixalayees moog tog cov yeebncuab kev, hab caum cov yeebncuab tsi su le moog txug ndlua ntawm lub nroog Nkinpe-as saab nubtuaj.
Kaum yim txheeb leej tubrog Npeenyamees kws sab tawv heev raug tua tuag taag huv tuabsi.

Dlua le lwm paab tsiv moog rua tom taj nraag moog txug ntawm lub Pobzeb Leemoos. Muaj tsib txheeb leej raug tua tuag taag rua ntawm tej tog kev. Cov Yixalayees tseem caum cov Npeenyamees kws seem moog txug rua huv lub nroog Nkidoos hab tua cov Npeenyamees tuag ob txheeb leej.
Taagnrho cov Npeenyamees kws raug tua tuag nub ntawd muaj neeg nkaum tsib txheeb leej. Puab cov ntawd puavleej yog cov tubrog kws sab tawv heev xwb.
Tabsis cov txivneej rau pua leej kws tsiv moog rua ntawm lub taj nraag tom lub Pobzeb Leemoos txhaj le dlim, hab puab nkaum tau plaub hlis tod.

Cov Yixalayees rov qaab moog muab cov Npeenyamees kws seem tua tuag taag huv tuabsi, tsi has txivneej, quaspuj, mivnyuas, hab tsaj txhu. Cov Yixalayees muab txhua lub zog kws nyob cheebtsaam ntawd hlawv kub nyaab taag dlu lug.
Thaus cov Yixalayees moog sis sau ua ke rua huv lub nroog Mixepas, puab tau coglug rua tug TSWV has tas, “Peb cov Yixalayees yuav tsi muab peb tej ntxhais qua rua cov Npeenyamees ua quaspuj le.”
Yog le ntawd, cov Yixalayees txhaj moog rua huv lub nroog Npethees hab moog nyob ntawm qhov chaw kws nrug Vaajtswv sis ntsib moog txug thaus tsaus ntuj. Puab quaj nyav ab sab heev has tas:
“Tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv, vim le caag yuav muaj tej xwmtxheej nuav? Vim le caag xeem Npeenyamees ca le tu noob huv tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees moog lawm?”
Taagkig kaaj ntug txoog cov pejxeem sawv ntxuv moog teeb tau ib lub thaaj rua huv lub nroog ntawd. Puab muab tsaj tua hlawv fij, hab fij khoom ua kev sis raug zoo rua tug TSWV.

Puab txawm nug has tas, “Yog le ntawd, peb cov Yixalayees puas muaj xeem twg kws tsi tau moog nrug suavdlawg koom ua ke rua ntawm qhov chaw kws nrug tug TSWV sis ntsib huv lub nroog Mixepas?” (Puab tub tau coglug tseg lawm has tas, yog leejtwg tseem tsi moog koom ua ke rua huv lub nroog Mixepas, yuavtsum muab tug ntawd tua povtseg.)
Cov Yixalayees tu sab heev vim tej kws puab tau ua rua puab cov kwvtij Npeenyamees. Puab txhaj has tas, “Nub nua cov Yixalayees ib xeem tu noob lawm.
Peb yuav ua le caag txhaj nrhav tau quaspuj rua cov txivneej Npeenyamees kws seem ntawd? Rua qhov peb tau coglug rua tug TSWV lawm has tas, peb yuav tsi muab peb tej ntxhais qua rua puab ua quaspuj.”

Ces puab sis nug has tas, “Cov Yixalayees xeem twg txhaj tsi tau moog pehawm tug TSWV huv lub nroog Mixepas?” Suavdlawg pum cov kws nyob huv lub nroog Yanpes huv Nkinpe-as, yeej tsi muaj ib paab twg tuaj rua huv lub yeej ntawd le.
Thaus puab hu cov tubrog lug txheeb saib paab twg tuaj qhov twg tuaj, mas tsi pum cov nyob huv lub nroog Yanpes tuaj ntawd le.

Yog le ntawd cov pejxeem kws tuaj sis sau, txhaj tso tau kaum txheeb tug txivneej kws sab tawv heev hab saamfwm rua puab has tas, “Mej ca le moog muab txhua tug tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Yanpes tua kuas tuag taag, lojxov tej quaspuj hab mivnyuas tsi pub seem ib tug le.
Txhua tug txivneej hab txhua tug quaspuj kws tsi yog ntxhais nkaujxwb, muab tua povtseg huv tuabsi.”
Puab txhaj coj tau plaub puas tug ntxhais nkaujxwb huv lub nroog Yanpes lug, hab coj cov ntxhais ntawd lug nyob huv lub yeej ntawm lub nroog Silaus kws nyob huv tebchaws Kana-aas.
Ces cov Yixalayees kws tuaj txoos ua ke ntawd txhaj tso tuabneeg moog has rua cov Npeenyamees kws nkaum ntawm lub Pobzeb Leemoos has tas, tsi muaj kev sis tua lawm.
Cov Npeenyamees ntawd txhaj rov lug, hab cov Yixalayees txhaj muab cov ntxhais kws puab coj huv lub nroog Yanpes lug rua cov Npeenyamees yuav ua quaspuj. Tabsis cov ntxhais ntawd tsi txhua puab hab.
Cov Yixalayees nyuaj sab heev rua cov Npeenyamees, vim tug TSWV muab puab cais tawm ntawd txhua xeem Yixalayees lawm.

Yog le ntawd, cov thawjcoj kws tuaj sis sau ua ke ntawd txhaj has tas, “Xeem Npeenyamees yeej tsi tshuav ib tug quaspuj seem le lawm. Peb yuav ua le caag txhaj nrhav tau quaspuj rua cov txivneej kws seem ntawd yuav?
Peb yuav tau nrhav kev rua xeem Npeenyamees kws seem ntawd, kuas cov Yixalayees kaum ob xeem txhaj tsi muaj ib xeem twg tu caajceg,
peb tsi muab peb tej ntxhais qua rua puab yuav, vim peb tau foom tsi zoo rua txhua tug kws muab ntxhais qua rua cov Npeenyamees yuav lawm.”

Ces puab txawm sis thaam has tas, “Tub yuav txug caij kws peb ua kevcai txwm xyoo ua tug TSWV tsaug nyob huv lub nroog Silaus.” (Lub nroog Silaus nyob ntawm lub nroog Npethees saab qaumteb, hab ntawm lub nroog Lenpaunas saab qaabteb, hab nyob saab nubtuaj ntawm txujkev kws moog rua huv lub nroog Npethees hab lub nroog Sekhees.)
Puab txhaj has rua cov Npeenyamees has tas, “Mej ca le moog nkaum rua tom tej vaaj txiv maab,

hab saib ntsoov, thaus twg cov hluas nkauj huv lub nroog Silaus tawm tuaj seev cev ua kevcai, mej ca le tawm huv vaaj txiv maab lug. Ib leeg nteg ib tug hluas nkauj hab coj nrug mej moog rua huv xeem Npeenyamees cheebtsaam aav.

Thaus puab txiv lossis puab tej nug tuaj cuag peb  hab ywg, peb  maam le has rua puab tas, ‘Thov mej ca rua puab yuav, rua qhov thaus kws taabtom sis tua peb tsi tau nteg quaspuj rua puab. Mej yeej tsi txhum, rua qhov tsi yog mej txhobtxwm qua mej tej ntxhais rua puab.’ ”

Ces cov Npeenyamees txawm ua le ntawd; puab ib leeg txhaj xaiv ib tug quaspuj ntawm cov hluas nkauj kws tuaj seev cev huv lub nroog Silaus, hab coj tsiv lawm. Ces puab rov qaab moog rua huv puab cheebtsaam aav, hab rov moog txhim khu puab tej qub nroog rua puab nyob.
Lub sijhawm ntawd cov Yixalayees txawm ncaim qhov chaw ntawd, nyag rov moog nrug nyag xeem, nyag tsev tuabneeg nyob hab rov moog rua huv nyag cheebtsaam aav lawm.
Lub sijhawm ntawd, cov Yixalayees tseem tsi tau muaj vaajntxwv, puab txhua tug nyag ua lawv le nyag lub sab nyam xwb.
